item.title: Using the synchronized keyword in coroutines?
item.description: Working with coroutines is subtly different from normal locking functions. Introduce some thread-safety with mutex.

item.title: Escaping Callback Hell with Generic SuspendCoroutine Infix Extension Functions
item.description: Callback hell happens all the time in Android. Luckily, with coroutines, there's an easy way out.
